SETASDEFAULT.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to set this as the default currency?
SETASDEFAULT.ERROR: Could not set as default currency

TYPE.NAME: Type
TYPE.DESCRIPTION: The type of the currency (Real or Virtual)

MODIFY.SUCCESS: Refer a friend configuration successfully saved.

REFERRERBONUSCODE.TITLE: Referrer Bonus
REFERRERBONUSCODE.DESC: This is the bonus that will be activated to the player that made the referral. (This happens on player conversion) (If you want to notify the player, please make sure that there is a notification linked to this bonus!)

REFEREEBONUSCODE.TITLE: Referee Bonus
REFEREEBONUSCODE.DESC: This is the bonus that will be activated to the player that was referred by some other player. (This happens on player conversion) (If you want to notify the player, please make sure that there is a notification linked to this bonus!)

REFERRALNOTIFICATION.TITLE: Referral Notification
REFERRALNOTIFICATION.DESC: This is the notification that will be sent to a player whenever someone signs up with their referral code. (This happens before player conversion)

NOTIFICATION.LABEL: Notification
NOTIFICATION.PLACE: Select the notification to send to player.
NOTIFICATION.DESC: The selected notification will be sent to this player via all the channels setup in the notification. (If the player has not opted out of any/all of the channels.

SEND.SUCCESS: Notification was queued and will be delivered to player shortly
SEND.FAIL: Could not queue notification, please try again later.

LIST.DESCRIPTION: a sortable list of players which can be filtered by domain and category.

CATEGORIES.PLAYERSEARCH: Search for the player that you would like to add to this category.
CATEGORIES.TITLE: Player Categories
CATEGORIES.DESCRIPTION: A searchable list of categories for players.

DOMAINNAME.TITLE: Domain
DOMAINNAME.DESC: Domain to which this category belongs
DOMAINNAME.PLACE: Silver Players are meant for domain X only.
